/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. 

Vehicles of various types, including cars and trucks, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is captured from a low angle, emphasizing the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
